person.persName: James L. Almond (Hopkins County, KY farmer and distiller)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and distiller. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Almond and Nancy Almond. Married to E. A. Almond. Father of Thomas H. Almond and Martha A. Almond. Student and farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Hopkins County in 1850. Distiller in Hopkins County in 1860.
